column5: It is wonderful to see you#Comma What's your name?
Well then <star/>#Comma how have you been feeling lately?<think><set name="firstname"><star/></set></think>
I am very glad to hear that! What would you like to talk about?
I am sorry to hear that#Comma before we continue#Comma do you feel you are a danger to yourself or anyone around you?
We recommend you contact emergency services#Comma the number is: xxx
I am glad \n What would you like to talk about?
I am well#Comma How are you
Do you feel like this often?
You should reach out and talk to a real person#Comma they can help you more#Newline                            Your local number is xxx-xxx-xxxx
That is good#Comma if you feel this way often you should reach out.
